title: How much money will Elton John make from Rocketman? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ok, you've got two or three different considerations here. First is the rights to his life story. That would be contractually agreed upon, a fixed sum. Next, music clearances. Everyone from Elton and Bernie to their management, record labels, and on down the line get a cut whenever songs are used. Sometimes for a pet project like this, the fees are very minimal, especially since… Third, Elton and his husband are producers on the film. So getting permission to use his songs is not an issue, and he helps with hiring the main performers in the film, like Taron. It hasn't been publically released what percentage of the box office Elton would end up with. But, it's worth mentioning that for projects outside touring and recording in the studio, he donates a significant portion (sometimes 100 percent) to his Elton John AIDS Foundation.
